name: Malaka Spice
address: GVPW+VRH Malaka Spice, Siddharth Chambers, Lane, off North Main Road, Koregaon Park, Pune, Maharashtra 411001

detailed_reviews.review_text: A bit of mosquitoes but they take care of it. The food was delicious. Prawns were the best. Thai curry was delicious too. The tofu was perfectly made. Veg top hat and sushi was good. Wouldnt suggest having the spring rolls, could hv been better.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Prarthana, Thank you for your review and rating. We are glad to know that you enjoyed your experience with Malaka Spice. Thank you again and we hope to see you soon Cheers, Team Malaka Spice

detailed_reviews.review_text: Nice ambience and service. There are a lot of varieties available for a variety of cuisine. The mosquito coil is a bit irritating. We had soup, starter and directly main course. Could not try desserts. Overall I will recommend it.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Niru, Thank you for your rating. We are glad to know that you enjoyed your experience with Malaka Spice Thank you again and we hope to see you soon Cheers, Team Malaka Spice

name: Spice Kitchen - J.W. Marriott Hotel
address: Spice Kitchen - J.W. Marriott Hotel, JW mairiett hottl punne, Lobby Level West, Senapati Bapat Rd, Shivajinagar, Pune, Maharashtra 411053

detailed_reviews.review_text: Great ambiance and the variety of options available in the buffet was also very good. All of the dishes were done very well. The veg and non veg sections were both very good alongside the desert section and the live counter.

I absolutely love the food at JW! And a Sunday Brunch few months back was an amazing experience! Three Things I liked: - The spread of cuisines - Ambience overall - Taste of food!!! At places like JW we pay for the experience as a customer, and Spice Kitchen is a beautiful experience. The Sunday brunch makes for an amazing Date option as well as a great time with friends and family. Definitely a must do!

name: Nusara Restaurant
address: Plot no. 587/3, Nusara Restaurant, CST 1221/C, Apte Rd, Shivajinagar, Pune, Maharashtra 411004

detailed_reviews.review_text: I had the pleasure of dining at the restaurant of Nusara @ Ramee Grand Pune a short while ago, where I was treated to an exceptional buffet experience that left an indelible mark on my palate and memory. From the moment I stepped into the elegant dining space, I knew I was in for a treat. They usually serve the buffet at their rooftop restaurant of It s Mirchi, however it is closed due to monsoon. Ambiance and Atmosphere The ambiance of the restaurant was a harmonious blend of sophistication and comfort. Soft lighting, tasteful decor, and cozy seating arrangements set the stage for a relaxing and enjoyable meal. The restaurants atmosphere struck a perfect balance between upscale dining and a welcoming, laid-back environment. Variety and Presentation The buffet spread was an absolute feast for the senses. The sheer variety of dishes on offer was awe-inspiring, catering to a wide range of palates and dietary preferences. From starters with flavourful deliciousness to succulent main course cooked to perfection, every dish was a work of art. The presentation of each item was meticulous, showcasing the culinary expertise of the kitchen staff. Quality of Food The quality of the food exceeded all expectations. Each dish was crafted with care and attention to detail, evident in the explosion of flavours with every bite. My friends enjoyed the seafood that was incredibly fresh, the chicken tender, and I had enjoyed the vegetarian options which were just as delightful. It was evident that the chefs take immense pride in their creations, as the flavours were bold, well-balanced, and left an unforgettable impression. Service The service provided by the restaurant staff was impeccable. Attentive, friendly, and knowledgeable, they went above and beyond to ensure that every diners needs were met. Empty plates were promptly cleared, new food was served properly, and any inquiries about the dishes were met with enthusiasm. The seamless service added to the overall positive experience of the buffet. Value for Money Considering the exceptional quality, variety, and service provided, the buffet at was undoubtedly a remarkable value for money. The experience felt like a culinary journey around the world, and the reasonable price for such a lavish spread was truly commendable. In conclusion, my visit to the restaurant at Ramee Grand for their buffet was an unforgettable gastronomic adventure. The combination of a welcoming ambiance, an array of delectable dishes, top-notch service, and excellent value for money made it a dining experience I wont soon forget. I wholeheartedly recommend this restaurant to fellow food enthusiasts and anyone looking for a culinary escape that tantalizes the taste buds and warms the heart. I look forward to returning to for another delightful buffet in the near future. Kudos to the entire team for creating such an exceptional dining experience!

Probably the best buffet spread Ive ever tasted! Oriental Fusion, located in Hotel Ramee Grand at Apte Road near Deccan, it a good place to have family lunch or dinner meetings or outings. The staff is too good & ambience is amazing. The food is also decorated as well as the view from their windows is mesmerizing. Furthermore, a huge variety of options to choose from include soups, self baked breads, starters, drinks, veg & non veg & lastly desserts. All of it comes just at Rs. 799/- and/or Rs. 899/- plus taxes. Do visit for a wholesome experience! <3 :) Vegetarian options: vast Dietary restrictions: followed Parking: numerous Kid-friendliness: amazing Wheelchair accessibility: available

name: Latitude Restaurant - Blue Diamond, Pune
address: Latitude Restaurant - Blue Diamond, Pune, Blue Diamond-IHCL SeleQtions, 11, Koregaon Rd, Koregaon Park, Pune, Maharashtra 411001

detailed_reviews.review_text: It was overall a decent experience I had my brunch today. They charge around 1500  +GST per head so plan your budget accordingly Kid-friendliness: Yes Wheelchair accessibility: Yes

I plan to write this review based on three main factors, the food(7/10) , the ambience (9/10) and the service (9/10) offered. The food -- great variety and decent taste. The food wasnt something completely outwordly but I believe that to be good, sorely because, five star retaurants are notorious for turning common delicacies into something not so delectable, and I admire the effort made to serve good looking food and good taste. The ambience -- One of the main things that seperates the Taj from any other place is the iconic and calming fragrance that greet you upon entry. Adding to that, Blue diamond has great architecture and a very warm staff keeping you company throughout your experience. The service-- The service was welcoming and precise. Enough to know exactly what is happening at your table and what needs attention but not bothering or intruding your experience. Would definitely go again
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Dear Guest, Thank you so much for sharing your rating / feedback. We sincerely appreciate and look forward to your continued association with us. Warm Regards, Melvyn Saldanha, General Manager, Blue Diamond-IHCL SeleQtions, Pune

name: Chinese Room
address: Chinese Room, 2434, East St, Hulshur, Camp, Pune, Maharashtra 411001

detailed_reviews.review_text: **Atmosphere:** Cozy and inviting with traditional decor. **Service:** Generally attentive and friendly, but may experience slight delays during peak hours. **Notable Dishes:**Chicken Manchurian, Vegetable Hakka Noodles, chicken fried rice. **Overall Review:** The Chinese Room offers authentic Chinese cuisine in a welcoming atmosphere with attentive service. Great for satisfying your Chinese food cravings.
Best place for Chinese food in Pune. The quality and taste hasnt depreciated in over 15 years. Service is prompt. Food is delicious and they have a large variety to select from.
